DOC.detailed_description: We plan conduct retrospective population-based cohort study within eight administrative database Canada , United States , United Kingdom . Within cohort , nest case-control analysis perform estimate incidence rate ratio ( RR ) AKI associate SNRIs compare SSRIs use conditional logistic regression , adjustment high-dimensional propensity score baseline . The overall effect across site estimate use meta-analytic method .
